sentences: Ta saatis meile oma arvamuse kirjaga.
context: The Estonian word 'saatsin' is the past tense form of 'saata', meaning 'to send'. In this context, it's used in relation to opinions - sending or delivering an opinion. The dictionary shows examples like 'Saatsin väitekirja kohta oma arvamuse' (I sent my opinion on the thesis) and refers to expert, specialist, institution, commission written opinions.
